card.name: Accursed Centaur
card.text: When Accursed Centaur enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

card.name: AEther Charge
card.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it deal 4 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Aggravated Assault
card.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Airborne Aid
card.text: Draw a card for each Bird on the battlefield.

card.name: Airdrop Condor
card.text: Flying {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin creature: Airdrop Condor deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Akroma's Blessing
card.text: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Cycling {W}

card.name: Akroma's Vengeance
card.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3}

card.name: Ancestor's Prophet
card.text: Tap five untapped Clerics you control: You gain 10 life.

card.name: Animal Magnetism
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent chooses a creature card from among them. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Annex
card.text: Enchant land You control enchanted land.

card.name: Aphetto Alchemist
card.text: {T}: Untap target artifact or creature. Morph {U}

card.name: Aphetto Dredging
card.text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aphetto Grifter
card.text: Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Tap target permanent.

card.name: Aphetto Vulture
card.text: Flying When Aphetto Vulture dies, you may put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
card.text: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Artificial Evolution
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one creature type with another. The new creature type can't be Wall.

card.name: Ascending Aven
Astral Slide
card.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Aura Extraction
card.text: Put target enchantment on top of its owner's library. Cycling {2}

card.name: Aurification
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a gold counter on it. Each creature with a gold counter on it is a Wall in addition to its other creature types and has defender. When Aurification leaves the battlefield, remove all gold counters from all creatures.

card.name: Avarax
card.text: Haste When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Aven Brigadier
card.text: Flying Other Bird creatures get +1/+1. Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Aven Fateshaper
card.text: Flying When Aven Fateshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {4}{U}: Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.text: Flying {2}{W}: Look at target face-down creature.

card.name: Battlefield Medic
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.

card.name: Biorhythm
card.text: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls.

card.name: Birchlore Rangers
card.text: Tap two untapped Elves you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Morph {G}

card.name: Blackmail
card.text: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

card.name: Blatant Thievery
card.text: For each opponent, gain control of target permanent that player controls.

card.name: Blistering Firecat
Bloodline Shaman
card.text: {T}: Choose a creature type. Reveal the top card of your library. If that card is a creature card of the chosen type, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Bloodstained Mire

card.name: Boneknitter

card.name: Break Open
card.text: Turn target face-down creature an opponent controls face up.

card.name: Brightstone Ritual
card.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Goblin on the battlefield.

card.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
card.text: Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield. Morph {2}{G}

card.name: Butcher Orgg
card.text: You may assign Butcher Orgg's combat damage divided as you choose among defending player and/or any number of creatures he or she controls.

card.name: Cabal Archon
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Cabal Executioner
card.text: Whenever Cabal Executioner deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. Morph {3}{B}{B}

card.name: Cabal Slaver
card.text: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Callous Oppressor
card.text: You may choose not to untap Callous Oppressor during your untap step. As Callous Oppressor enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a creature type. {T}: Gain control of target creature that isn't of the chosen type for as long as Callous Oppressor remains tapped.

card.name: Catapult Master

card.name: Catapult Squad

card.name: Chain of Acid
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Then that permanent's controller may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chain of Plasma
card.text: Chain of Plasma deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may discard a card. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chain of Silence
card.text: Prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn. That creature's controller may sacrifice a land. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chain of Smog
card.text: Target player discards two cards. That player may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chain of Vapor
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that permanent's controller may sacrifice a land. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.text: Charging Slateback can't block. Morph {4}{R}

card.name: Crown of Awe

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Patriarch's Bidding
card.text: Each player chooses a creature type. Each player returns all creature cards of a type chosen this way from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Pearlspear Courier
card.text: You may choose not to untap Pearlspear Courier during your untap step. {2}{W}, {T}: Target Soldier creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance for as long as Pearlspear Courier remains tapped.

card.name: Peer Pressure
card.text: Choose a creature type. If you control more creatures of that type than each other player, you gain control of all creatures of that type.

card.name: Piety Charm
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target Aura attached to a creature; or target Soldier creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn; or creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Pinpoint Avalanche
card.text: Pinpoint Avalanche deals 4 damage to target creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Polluted Delta
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Profane Prayers deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.

card.name: Prowling Pangolin
card.text: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.

card.text: Until end of turn, Wizards you control gain "{T}: Counter target spell."

card.text: Draw X cards. For each card drawn this way, discard a card unless you sacrifice a permanent.

card.name: Riptide Laboratory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{U}, {T}: Return target Wizard you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Riptide Replicator
card.text: As Riptide Replicator enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. Riptide Replicator enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {4}, {T}: Put an X/X creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield, where X is the number of charge counters on Riptide Replicator.

card.name: Riptide Shapeshifter
card.text: {2}{U}{U}, Sacrifice Riptide Shapeshifter: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card of that type. Put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle the rest into your library.

card.name: Risky Move
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains control of Risky Move. When you gain control of Risky Move from another player, choose a creature you control and an opponent. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, that opponent gains control of that creature.

card.name: Tephraderm
